# [Interview #849: Memories of Light, Entry #11](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=849#11)

#### Day 11

"One more thing, the
*marath'damane*
. . ."

"I'll deal with those channelers personally," Mat said.

She gawked at him as if he were insane. (p. 514)
